recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti al dente. Fry bacon until crispy. Whisk eggs with Parmesan cheese and black pepper. Toss spaghetti with bacon and egg mixture. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions: Cut chicken into small pieces. Stir-fry chicken with vegetables. Add soy sauce, ginger, and garlic. Serve with rice.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.instructions: Cream together butter and sugar. Beat in eggs. Stir in flour and chocolate chips. Drop by spoonfuls onto baking sheets. Bake until golden brown.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Butter the bread. Place cheese between two slices of bread. Grill until golden and crispy.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions: Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing. Add croutons and Parmesan cheese. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Chicken Tacos
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken and shred it. Fill taco shells with chicken and toppings. Serve with sour cream.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients into a batter. Cook on a hot griddle until golden brown. Serve with syrup.

recipes.title: Vegetable Soup
recipes.instructions: Chop vegetables and simmer in broth until tender. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Beef Stew
recipes.instructions: Brown beef in a pot. Add vegetables and broth. Simmer until tender.

recipes.title: Apple Pie
recipes.instructions: Fill pie crust with apples and sugar. Bake until crust is golden brown.

recipes.title: BBQ Ribs
recipes.instructions: Season ribs with spices and BBQ sauce. Bake until tender.

recipes.title: Lemon Meringue Pie
recipes.instructions: Make lemon filling and pour into pie crust. Top with meringue and bake.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Pizza
recipes.instructions: Roll out dough. Top with sauce, cheese, and vegetables. Bake until golden.

recipes.title: Fish Tacos
recipes.instructions: Cook fish. Fill taco shells with fish and toppings. Serve with lime wedges.

recipes.title: Baked Ziti
recipes.instructions: Cook ziti and mix with sauce and cheese. Bake until golden.
